name: Observable Entity
description: The observable entity object is a pivot element that contains related information found in many places in the event.

names.description: The name of the observable attribute. For example: file.name.

type.description: The observable value type name that is not in the pre-defined types.

-1.description: The observable data type is not mapped. See the type attribute, which may contain data source specific value.
-1.name: Other

values.description: The value associated with the observable attribute. The meaning of the data depends on the observable type.
